definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Cowart and schlesselman are scheduled to appear before a judge on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 斯科莱瑟尔曼和科瓦特将于星期三出庭受审。

sentences.english: In this case, enters the defendant who the court stands trial to be very possibly in court retracts a confession.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，走进法庭受审的被告很可能当庭翻供。

sentences.english: Hart is scheduled to appear in court March 10.
sentences.chinese: 哈特将于三月10日出庭受审。

sentences.english: He was tried because he had acted as a Greman spy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他因在战争期间充当德国人的间谍而受审。

sentences.english: He faces trial on extortion charges.
sentences.chinese: 他将因被指控敲诈而受审。

sentences.english: Then military helicopters will be sent to Cairo, Mubarak Police Academy for trial.
sentences.chinese: 随后军用直升机将把穆巴拉克送至开罗警官学院受审。

sentences.english: In the scenes of trial that followed, Jesus was the calmest character present.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的受审场景，耶稣是座中最平静的人。

sentences.english: Rajaratnam has gone on trial for allegedly masterminding an insider-trading ring.
sentences.chinese: 而拉贾拉特南已经因涉嫌策划一个内部交易圈而受审。

sentences.english: Jack has been brought before the court on a charge of murder.
sentences.chinese: 杰克以谋杀罪被迫出庭受审。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Competency to stand trial Determining Instrument is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 结论受审能力评定表具有较好的实用性。

sentences.english: It is not merely Socrates who is on trial.
sentences.chinese: 不单仅是苏格拉底受审。

sentences.english: The king demanded that the man should come forward to answer the charge in a civil court, but Becket refused to allow this.
sentences.chinese: 国王要求此教士到世俗法庭受审，但贝克特予以拒绝。

sentences.english: Tian stands trial today in her hometown for her involvement in the scandal.
sentences.chinese: 今天，在她的家乡，田文华因卷入奶粉弊案而受审。

sentences.english: The 47 defendants appeared behind closed doors in a special security court in Manama.
sentences.chinese: 47名被告在麦纳麦特别安全法庭闭门受审。

sentences.english: The Sparrow's for trial, at next bird assizes .
sentences.chinese: 下回鸟儿法庭，受审者为麻雀。

definition: to commit sb for trial/to bring sb for interrogation
public trial (in a court of law)
to pronounce a sentence (after a verdict in a court of law)
to send away under escort (criminals, goods etc)
in custody/to keep sb in detention
to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
